attributes.action: Maria Miller should return all taxpayers money and contribute towards the investigation into her affairs
attributes.additional_details:
Maria Miller has shown by her attitudes and actions that she considers her behaviour acceptable.  Any member of the public in a similar situation, not only would be thoroughly investigated by the police, but would liable for prosecution.
The government should insist the full £45,000 taxpayers’ money should be returned, with costs for investigation.
Furthermore, she should be immediately removed from office.  We must end MPs claiming fraudulent benefits, -that is the taxpayers money.
An independent body, not answerable to Parliament, with real powers to fine public servants, should be set-up.  MPs cannot police their own.
